price: 38 Nous avons, en vérité, créé les cieux, la terre et ce qui se trouve entre eux, en six jours sans éprouver la moindre peine.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā fī sittati ayyāmin wamā massanā min lughūbin
